rulesDetail1: This Terms of Use, together with the documents referenced herein (here in after referred to as the "Terms") are applicable to Customers accessing the application, using the services of the MyGarment Mobile Application on the iOS and Android platforms. This clause is to establish the rights and obligations of customers when using products / services.

rulesDetail2: Applications, solutions, goods, services, logos and other content related to MYGARMENT and MYGARMENT services are under the legal management, possession and use, integrity and non-transferable. by MYGARMENT. Customer must respect these rights and MYGARMENT strictly prohibits any infringement of MYGARMENT's intellectual property rights. Customers undertake:
rules21: Respect MYGARMENT's intellectual property rights and the products in MYGARMENT services; not arbitrarily change the names, images and brand-related ingredients of MYGARMENT products anywhere.
rules22: Do not perform or assist a third party to conduct acts that infringe upon MYGARMENT's intellectual property rights.
rules23: Cooperate with and provide information requested by MYGARMENT in the investigation of suspected criminal, fraudulent or violation MYGARMENT regulations.
